name: Microscope
specifications: Compound light microscope; adjustable objective lenses (4x, 10x, 40x, 100x); mechanical stage; LED or mirror illumination; typically 5â€“10 kg.
function: Allows magnified viewing of blood, urine, or tissue samples on glass slides for diagnosis or training.
usage: Wear gloves; set up microscope on a stable surface; place prepared slide on stage; start with lowest magnification; adjust focus and illumination carefully.
maintenance: Clean lenses with lens paper; turn off illumination when not in use; cover after use to prevent dust accumulation.
warning: Using dirty slides, touching lenses with fingers, forcing focus knobs, or improper cleaning.
